mdRecord.dcterms:title: Canterbury Shaker Village, exterior
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is an unidentified building within the Canterbury Shaker Village in Concord, New Hampshire. Canterbury Shaker Village is one of the oldest, most typical, and best preserved of the Shaker communities. It boasts an intact, first-generation 18th-century Meetinghouse and Dwelling House, both on their original sites. http://www.shakers.org/discover-and-learn/historic-buildings-final.html [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture and City Planning
